constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 88 (Thursday, May 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GROTHMAN:
H.R. 3399.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution,
specifically Clause 1 (related to the general Welfare of the
United States).
[Page H2653]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.

title: To amend the Federal Power Act to require the consideration of invasive species when prescribing fishways, and for other purposes.
